EmailTemplate.subject: NCS Regional Youth Board - plans for the summer!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
{!Contact.FirstName}!
It's time for our next NCS North London Regional Youth Board meeting!
And it's a special one...
You are invited to the NCS Youth Board Summer 2016 Launch event!
Date: Saturday 23rd July Time: 11:30 - 14:30 Location: Highgate Road Chapel, Chetwynd Road, NW5 1BU
Come along, reunite with your NCS Regional Youth Board and meet new mates from the NCS Local Youth Boards across the region. We've lined up a whole host of projects that you can get involved in this summer...
# Social media takeovers with The Challenge Society
# Event Management with Haringey Arts Festival
# NCS Dragons
# Social Action with Reaching Communities
Book your FREE ticket for the launch event HERE! (https://www.eventbrite.co.uk/e/ncs-youth-board-summer-launch-2016-tickets-26151222009)
------------------------------------------------
ONE LAST THING:
On Monday 1st August, we're holding our annual TCS Summer Kick Off near Walthamstow (you should have received an email about it on July 6th).
We're looking for members of the Regional Youth Board to sit on a panel of Dragons to give funding to charity projects devised by your fellow NCS Graduates.
If you're free on the day, and would like to be an all-powerful Dragon, reply to this email to let us know. We'll then discuss it further at the meeting on July 23rd.
We can't wait to see you again this summer!
The Challenge Society
